A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredibly disappointing movie! I love Star Wars\, but Rian Johnson completely ruined Luke Skywalker by making him a sulking wimp! Apparently the laws of physics do not apply to Jedi\, making them more akin to Marvel superheroes. Snoke is now a throwaway character. Star Wars Episode IX is essentially a stand alone movie now. Clearly\, Disney had no clear idea for how to handle a new Star Wars trilogy\, instead deciding releasing a movie and calling it Star Wars is enough to take people's money.
